materialAlphaMode.description: is this material opaque, blended or uses an alpha mask ?

texture.description: an index into the textures list

sampler.description: an index into the samplers list

textureCoordinates.description: the index of texture coordinates to use

transformRotation.description: the texture coordinates rotation in radians

emissiveFactor.description: how emissive this material is in RGB format, used as a multiplier if emissiveTexture is present

alphaCutoff.description: when using Mask alpha mode, every pixels of this material under this alpha cutoff is discarded

doubleSided.description: is this material double sided ? If not backface culling is applied

unlit.description: if true this material won't take any lighting

metallicRoughnessExtension.title: MaterialMetallicRoughnessExtension
metallicRoughnessExtension.description: this allows for the metallic roughness workflow

metallicRoughnessTextureInfo.description: the metallic/roughness texture info; R=metallic, G=roughness

colorFactor.description: the albedo of this material, if colorTexture is present, used as a multiplier

metallicFactor.description: the metalness of this material, if metallicRoughnessTexture is present: used as a multiplier

roughnessFactor.description: the roughness of this material, if metallicRoughnessTexture is present: used as a multiplier

specularGlossinessExtension.title: MaterialSpecularGlossinessExtension
specularGlossinessExtension.description: this allows for the specular glossiness workflow, this extension takes priority over metallic roughness if both are present

specularGlossinessTextureInfo.description: the specular/glossiness texture info; RGB=specular, A=glossiness

diffuseFactor.description: the diffuse of this material, if diffuseTexture is present, used as a multiplier

specularFactor.description: the specularity of this material, if specularGlossinessTexture is present: used as a multiplier

glossinessFactor.description: the glossiness of this material, if specularGlossinessTexture is present: used as a multiplier
